metadata.dc:author: Villazón Ruiz, L
Arístegui Ruiz, M
Fernández Fernández Vega, L
Sanz Fernández, R
Molina Quirós, C
Díaz Cárdenas, A
metadata.dc:description: Describing the most relevant findings in the benign tumors of the nose, we present a case of cyst that eroded the dorsum of the nose and produced an aesthetic deformity. The treatment was a rhinoplasty operation including the removal of the cyst and the hump. After the anatomopathological findings we studied the different cysts, arriving at the concluding diagnosis that the cyst is sebaceus.
metadata.dc:title: Deformidad de la pirámide nasal secundaria a tumoración benigna del dorso.
[Deformity of the nasal pyramid secondary to benign tumor of the nasal dorsum].
